problems.title: GCD Sort of an Array (Number Theory)
problems.description:
You are given an integer array nums, and you can perform the following operation any number of times on nums:
Swap the positions of two elements nums[i] and nums[j] if gcd(nums[i], nums[j]) > 1.
Return true if it is possible to sort nums in non-decreasing order using the above swap method, or false otherwise.

Input Format:
First line: integer n.
Second line: n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print true or false.
hintsList: Use Union-Find to group numbers that can be swapped.
Check if each number can move to its sorted position (i.e., belongs to the same component).
